name: Märchen Veil II
overview: Märchen Veil II is the second part of the story that began in Märchen Veil I. The bereaved king of the Lake Country seeks the help of the powerful goddess Lua as he tries to remove the curse that has befallen his son. However, the prince feels it is his duty to defeat the evil wizard responsible for the curse, and he embarks on a journey to gather mysterious artifacts that will help him achieve this goal. Gameplay-wise, the game is very similar to its predecessor. The prince explores maze-like overhead areas, fighting enemies with ranged magic and power-ups. The sequel expands equipment management, allowing the player to change equipped items at any time.
